title: Start
body:
#Act 1; Scene 1; Part 1
#___ Business Park; OK Tacos; 11:45am
#Load Anya
Aanya:
#* indicates I need italics for this line. (inner monologue)
Aanya*:
Aanya:Hi there! What can I get for ya?
#Load Ruth
????:O-hi. Could I get... two carne asada tacos and a... cherry Funta?
Aanya:Sure, coming right up!
Aanya*:Isn't her earring from Parallax Eons? I wonder...
????:Oh! Sorry, but could you hold the peppers, onions, cilantro, salsa, and side carrots?
Aanya*:Oh. Plain, huh?
Aanya:So, just plain beef tacos?
????:Errr... yeah. Thanks.
Aanya*:Maybe Boss will let me have this taco then...
Aanya:Here you go, have a good one!.
????:Thanks, you too.
Aanya:Love your earring, by the way. Glory to the Redfields!
????:Declare victory!
Aanya*:She posed with her fist to the sky, clutching the cherry Funta.
????:!!!
????:.....
Aanya*:...I guess I got a little carried away...
Aanya: Umm... here's some napkins and... um... a fork.
????:...thanks...
Aanya:...
Aanya:Oh hey, the line's gone. Hey Boss. Can I take my lunch now?
Boss:*nod*
Aanya:Hey Boss. Can I have this mis-taco?
Boss:*nod*
Aanya:Thanks boss. I'll be back in 30.
#Change background here
#Load Ruth
Aanya:Hi again! Mind if I sit here?
????:!!!
????:Go ahead.
Aanya:Thanks.
????:...
Aanya:...
????:.....*munch*
Aanya:.....
Aanya*:Do I... say anything?
->I really should...
    Aanya:...
    ????:...
    Aanya:.....
->Say something...
->But...
    Aanya:...
    ????:...
    Aanya:.....
Aanya:So you play Parallax?
Aanya*:Wow. Just... wow.
????:Yeah.
????:...
Aanya*:Erm... what now?
->"Nice weathe-"
    ????:D-
    Aanya:Nic-
    Aanya*:Crap.
    Aanya:Go ahead, you first.
    ????:Mm.
->Am I seriously gonna talk about the weather?@timer@550
????:Do you play?
Aanya:Yup. My parent's got me a GS Rita for Christmas last year, and this was the promo game it had.
#Ruth shake
????:Wait, you got the promo version!? Lucky... that came with the GS exclusive 'Intention Flux' armor set...
Aanya*:Even though...
->It wasn't as strong as the armor set I already had...
    Aanya:The promo set wasn't really that strong though.
    ????:Isn't it better that way? Like really strong items can only be obtained by hard work.
    Aanya*:Or money.
    Aanya:I've found it kinda weird that these legendary items aren't as good as some of the rare ones, though.
    ????:But if everyone just picked the strongest item, the game would look really... silly. I mean, I still use 'Paradox Manual' even though 'Matter Formula' is strictly better.
    ????:Sometimes you just want to use an item that your character would enjoy!
    Aanya*:Like all the players that wear cosmetic armor into battle for... roleplaying?
->It still looked really cool.
    Aanya:The art they used for it was really beautiful.
    ????:Right? The lore behind the set sent shivers down my spine! I think the Masked Queen is one of my favorite NPCs.
    Aanya:She was the one that turned all of the captured prisoners into mirror copies of herself, right?
    Aanya*:I also believe that was the fight that everyone complained about because it was way too hard...
    ????:Yeah! I just loved how atmospheric the fight felt.
    ????:I mean, until you were ganked by a dozen copies.
    ????:But the throne room her fight was in... the detail in all the chains running across the floor...
    ????:You felt in the presence of a real queen.
#Ruth ringtone
????:Ah.
????:I gotta head back to work. Maybe I'll see you again?
Aanya*:No doubt, i'm here Monday through Friday.
Aanya:Most likely.
Aanya:...
Aanya*:She was a nice person.
Aanya*:...
Aanya:I forgot to ask her name.
#END SCENE 1
[[Act1_Scene2_s]]
